segments.text: Excuse me , can you tell me the way to Holton railway station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It ’ s quite far from here . Don ’ t worry , though . It ’ s not difficult to get there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I ’ m going in the wrong direction , aren ’ t ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . First , you need to turn around . Do you remember passing some traffic lights further up this road ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . They are about two miles away , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right . Drive back to the traffic rights and turn right . Follow the road for about a mile , until you see the plaza hotel . It ’ s a really big hotel . You can ’ t miss it . Turn left at the hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , right at the traffic lights two miles up the road , then left at the plaza hotel , a mile along that road . Got it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then you just go straight on until you see the station ahead of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Got it . Thanks for you help .
segments.speaker: S1
